Summary Note:
The RM met Eevi Lotta Niemi during a business conference in Helsinki. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Eevi Lotta Niemi is a 57 year old Private Equity Investor from Finland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Eevi Lotta Niemi is married to Tiainen. Together they have 1 kid called Maarika.
Education Background:
Eevi obtained her secondary school diploma from Joensuu Christian College in 1987.
Eevi earned her degree from Ã…bo Akademi University School of Economics in 1992.
Occupation History:
Eevi Lotta Niemi is a 57 year old and comes from Finland.
At Varma Mutual Pension Insurance Company, Eevi Lotta Niemi held the position of Stockbroker from 1991 to 1995, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Portfolio Manager at Sampo Group in 1997, further expanding her skill set.
At Varma Mutual Pension Insurance Company, she worked as a Hedge Fund Manager from 2003 to 2005, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 2005, she transitioned to Veritas Pension Insurance Company to take on the position of Private Equity Investor, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 1410000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Vaasa and Lahti, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She inherited a significant sum of 2940000 EUR from her mother, a respected Hedge Fund Manager, in 2009, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Eevi as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
